name: MaxRacer
overview: MaxRacer is a futuristic racing game similar to Wipeout. There are three courses and five different racers, each with their own abilities. The game runs on an arcade-style checkpoint system, ending the race if you don't reach each checkpoint quickly enough, and also gives each racer a shield meter to discourage hitting the walls. The game is only one-player, but best times can be saved with a memory card.
